analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Bahukārā, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇagahapatikā tumhākaṁ ye vo paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārehi.
analyzed: bahu kārā bhikkhave brāhmaṇa gahapatikā tumhākam ye vaḥ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhārehi

original: Tumhepi, bhikkhave, bahukārā brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṁ yaṁ nesaṁ dhammaṁ desetha ādikalyāṇaṁ
analyzed: tumhe pi bhikkhave bahu kārāḥ brāhmaṇa gahapatikānam yam na īsam dhammaṃ desetha ādi kalyāṇa

original: majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ
analyzed: majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjana kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddha

original: Evamidaṁ, bhikkhave, aññamaññaṁ nissāya brahmacariyaṁ vussati oghassa nittharaṇatthāya sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
analyzed: evam idam bhikkhave aññam aññam nissāya brahmacariyam vussati oghassa nittharaṇa tthāya sammā dukkhassa anta kiriyāya ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
